7 July 2009

Twitter Communication is Scale Free

by erich

Creating a network from a sample of communications from approximately 900,000 people on Twitter, the distribution of distinct communication partners result fits the definition of a scale-free network.Â  The power is a little higher than scale-free networks usually described for social networks (2<k<3), but not much.
